parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The provided post does not contain a CMF number. While the absence of a CMF number is not automatically disqualifying, it suggests the post might not be directly linked to an officially registered candidate's campaign.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post explicitly mentions Mircea Geoana and encourages viewers to vote for the Partidul România în Acțiune Mehedinți.  This directly refers to a political party participating in the elections, fulfilling Article 36 (7) - a.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>As a paid Facebook post, this content is clearly intended to reach a wide audience, not just a select few.  The use of hashtags further amplifies its public reach, satisfying Article 36 (7) - c.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The primary objective of the post is to persuade voters to support Partidul România în Acțiune Mehedinți. The call to action ("vote for...") directly aims to influence electoral outcomes, thus satisfying Article 36 (7) - c. The use of a prominent figure like Mircea Geoana further strengthens this objective.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post does not present itself as journalistic. It lacks the objectivity and neutrality expected from journalistic reporting. Instead, it promotes a specific political party, making it promotional rather than informative.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The post is not expressing a personal opinion; it's a clear endorsement of a political party.  The call to action removes any ambiguity about its intent.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>7967423503360752</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post fulfills all the criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. It refers to a specific political party (PRA), targets a wide audience through a paid Facebook campaign, and has the clear objective of influencing voters to support that party.  The absence of a CMF number, while not definitive, raises concerns about transparency. The post's timing is crucial; if it was published after the official end of the electoral campaign period, it would constitute a violation of Article 98 t) of LEGE nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>Mircea Geoana</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
  <candidate><name>Partidul România în Acțiune</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>PRA</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Partidul România în Acțiune Mehedinți, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei postări plătite pe Facebook după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, care îndeamnă la votarea Partidului România în Acțiune Mehedinți, folosind imaginea lui Mircea Geoana. Postarea, cu ID-ul 7967423503360752,  îndeplinește toate criteriile propagandei electorale conform articolului 36 (7) din LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006, având ca obiectiv influențarea votului printr-o adresare directă către publicul larg, depășind limitele jurnalismului.  Efectul electoral este clar, vizând creșterea numărului de voturi pentru PRA.  Cheltuielile estimate se situează între 700 și 799 RON, iar postarea a atins între 30.000 și 35.000 de impresii, cu o estimare a audienței de 100.000 - 500.000 persoane.  Informațiile de contact ale advertiserului sunt disponibile în Ad Library: email part9419@partidulromaniainactiunemehedinti.info, telefon +40743302640, adresă Drobeta-Turnu Severin, Mehedinți, website https://partidulromaniainactiunemehedinti.info/.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
